titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B34
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B34

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

graphic.desc: By kind permission of British Museum

div.tei:ab: 1.[... ...]mr | (b-ġ)lw[...] | (ft)ḥ | (w)-(s)ṯb | šk-ʾy | ywm(h) | hn | f(t)ḥ | ḥ[... ...] 2.[... ...]n | bny | w-ġw(ṯ) | w-sʿḏb | ḏ-ḫbl | b-mḥwlh | ẓlt | bn | ʾrḍ | ʿ[... ...] 3.(ʾh)l | ʾmnhtn | bhny | bʾs | k-bny | ṯʿd-sm | ʿm | mʿn | b(n) | mbny[... ...]= 4.nʾy | mʿn | b-ybnyn | w-sʿḏb | ṣlwtn | w-mḥwl | ẓlt(n) | w-(s)[..](fs) | [... ...] 5.w-mḥfdh | ḍfw | ʾḥly | ẓltn | l-ʾy | ybny | ṭ(bn) | m(ʿn) | [...] | (hn) | [... ...]= 6.ʾn | w-ẓltn | w-hm-ʾy | (ḏ)-ynḍw | ʾ(w | ḏ)-yḫ(bl) [| ... ...]yw[... ...]= 7.l | w-šk-ʾy | ywmh | ʿtn[y] | bhny | bʾs | b(ny) | w-(lġ)n | w-(ġ)w(ṯ) | [... ...] 8.r(y)mh | mḥwln | ʿd | śnn | hgr | šk-ḏ | wfʾ | w-l | ybtny(n) | [..]f[... ...] 9.[..|] w-(lġ)n-sm | šk-ḏ | lġn | mʿn | ywmnt | ftḥn | w-mṯ(btn) [|... ...] 10.[... ...|] (bn |) hwfʾl | ḏ-nyṭ | w-stwqh | sm[ʿ... ...]

rymh | mḥwln | ʿd | śnn | hgr | šk-ḏ | wfʾ | w-l | ybtnyn | ..f
..| w-lġn-sm | šk-ḏ | lġn | mʿn | ywmnt | ftḥn | w-mṯbtn |
| bn | hwfʾl | ḏ-nyṭ | w-stwqh | smʿ

mr b-ġlw... ftḥ w-sṯb šk-ʾy ywmh hn ftḥ ḥ
n bny w-ġwṯ w-sʿḏb ḏ-ḫbl b-mḥwlh ẓlt bn ʾrḍ ʿ
ʾhl ʾmnhtn bhny bʾs k-bny ṯʿd-sm ʿm mʿn bn mbny=
nʾy mʿn b-ybnyn w-sʿḏb ṣlwtn w-mḥwl ẓltn w-s..fs
w-mḥfdh ḍfw ʾḥly ẓltn l-ʾy ybny ṭbn mʿn ... hn =
ʾn w-ẓltn w-hm-ʾy ḏ-ynḍw ʾw ḏ-yḫbl yw=
l w-šk-ʾy ywmh ʿtny bhny bʾs bny w-lġn w-ġwṯ
rymh mḥwln ʿd śnn hgr šk-ḏ wfʾ w-l ybtnyn ..f
.. w-lġn-sm šk-ḏ lġn mʿn ywmnt ftḥn w-mṯbtn
bn hwfʾl ḏ-nyṭ w-stwqh smʿ

mr b-ġlw... ftḥ w-sṯb šk-ʾy ywmh hn ftḥ ḥ
n bny w-ġwṯ w-sʿḏb ḏ-ḫbl b-mḥwlh ẓlt bn ʾrḍ ʿ
ʾhl ʾmnhtn bhny bʾs k-bny ṯʿd-sm ʿm mʿn bn mbny=
nʾy mʿn b-ybnyn w-sʿḏb ṣlwtn w-mḥwl ẓltn w-s..fs
w-mḥfdh ḍfw ʾḥly ẓltn l-ʾy ybny ṭbn mʿn ... hn =
ʾn w-ẓltn w-hm-ʾy ḏ-ynḍw ʾw ḏ-yḫbl yw=
l w-šk-ʾy ywmh ʿtny bhny bʾs bny w-lġn w-ġwṯ
rymh mḥwln ʿd śnn hgr šk-ḏ wfʾ w-l ybtnyn ..f
.. w-lġn-sm šk-ḏ lġn mʿn ywmnt ftḥn w-mṯbtn
bn hwfʾl ḏ-nyṭ w-stwqh smʿ

1.[... ... ...] made a legal ruling and established since the day when the ruling was made [... ...] 2.[... ...] built and restored and repaired what had become ruined in the enclosure wall of the structure (?) from the ground [... ...] 3.[... ...] the people of the guarantors of the lineage of Baʾs to build their allotted portion together with Maʿīn with regard to the construction [... ...] 4.[... ...] Maʿīn will build and repair the portico and the enclosure wall of the structure(?) [... ...] 5.[... ...] and the towers of Ḍafaw, the adornments(?) of the structure(?). May the ṭbn-class of Maʿīn build [...] when [... ...] 6.[... ...] and the structure(?). And if anyone should destroy or damage [... ... ... ...] 7.[... ...] and since the day when the lineage of Baʾs was charged with the construction and refurbishing(?) and restoration [... ...] 8.[... ...] upper portion of the enclosure wall in the direction of the town, so that [...]. And may it be built [... ...] 9.[... ...] and refurbished(?) them, so that Maʿīn made (take charge of) the refurbishing(?). The date of this legal ruling and declaration [... ...] 10.[... ...] bin Hawfāʾīl Dhū-Nayṭ and was commanded, (as) a witness [... ...]

... made a legal ruling and established since the day when the ruling was made
built and restored and repaired what had become ruined in the enclosure wall of the structure ? from the ground
the people of the guarantors of the lineage of Baʾs to build their allotted portion together with Maʿīn with regard to the construction
Maʿīn will build and repair the portico and the enclosure wall of the structure?
and the towers of Ḍafaw, the adornments? of the structure?. May the ṭbn-class of Maʿīn build ... when
and the structure?. And if anyone should destroy or damage
and since the day when the lineage of Baʾs was charged with the construction and refurbishing? and restoration
upper portion of the enclosure wall in the direction of the town, so that .... And may it be built
and refurbished? them, so that Maʿīn made take charge of the refurbishing?. The date of this legal ruling and declaration
bin Hawfāʾīl Dhū-Nayṭ and was commanded, as a witness
